name: Neocoill Artist Style
description:
Neocoill Style LORA_V1

This Lora is trained on the amazing artworks of neocoill .

https://twitter.com/NeoCoillhq


  • You can use with weight between 0.8 and 1.1 depending on how many other loras used.

  • Clip skip: 2 is can really help.

  • Keyword neocoill can realy flesh out the style even more

  • This LoRA works best when used for NSFW gens but also capable of SFW gens

  • This lora tend to force dynamic angles and poses, this can prevented by lowering its weight .

  • This LoRA has its own way of presenting for body proportions, keep that in mind when using tags like big breasts ,curvy or muscular.

  • Adding the tag realistic seem to have the interesting effect of swithcing beween the artsits old way of drawing and the current state of its style .


Preview Samples Settings:

  •  Checkpoint : AOM-A3

  • Sampler: DPM++ 2M Karras

  • Steps: 24 - 28

Lora Trained over Anything-4.5

If you like it, please consider rating
